Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:汇

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+6C47

Main pronunciation 主要发音: huì

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning (orig) a container. (now) to gather together later to remit money.

English senses 英语理解:

Usage example 用法举例: 匯款 huì kuǎn (remittance)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 99999

Shuowen 说文解字: 器也從匚淮聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 匯 mutants 滙龨 from (rem- 滙 huì) and (rem- 龨 huì) from box 匚𠥓匸 fāng-xì and phonetic Anhui-river 淮 huái C239 匯<滙> B042 汇[匯彙] new-char 汇. (name- gather-together (汇)滙匯 huì)

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :
A confluence of rivers, thus a compendium. A container.

Simplification rule : B042 汇[匯彙]

Simplification rule explained :
new-char phonetic-phonetic 匯彙 rearanged-parts 滙匯 deleted-parts 汇滙 匯(flow together) 彙(hedgehog)

Variant rule : C239 匯<滙>

Variant rule clarification :
匯 (converge) TW 滙 <converge>

滙字的基本解释

滙
huì
见“汇”。

滙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huì］
［《廣韻》胡罪切，上賄，匣。］
［《廣韻》苦淮切，平皆，溪。］
亦作“滙1”。“汇1”的繁体字。
(1)河流会合。
(2)聚集；合并。
(3)迂回，围绕。
(4)通过钱庄、银号、银行等金融机构或邮电局把甲地款项划拨到乙地。
(5)方言。抽，拔。

exchange
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huì］
["Guangyun" all crimes, bribery, box. ]
["Guangyun" bitterly cut, flat all, creek. ]
Also known as "Remittance 1". Traditional Chinese characters for "汇1".
(1) Rivers meet.
(2) Gather; merge.
(3) Roundabout, around.
(4) Transfer money from place A to place B through financial institutions such as money houses, banks, banks, or post and telecommunications bureaus.
(5) Dialects. Pump, pull.
